name: Career Center
description: Career Center provides the professional development, career and education coaching, networking and job openings Transition Services: - Referrals to full and part-time job opportunities with New Door partner employers - Support and coaching during the job search and application process - Letters of recommendation from the New Door team - Résumé and cover letter writing support - Opportunity to participate in Career Search Accelerator program for personalized coaching and support on things like ré
